title-group.article-title: Proving Primality in Essentially Quartic Random Time

abstract.p: This paper presents an algorithm that, given a prime n, finds and verifies a proof of the primality of n in random time $(\lg n)^{4 + o(1)} $ . Several practical speedups are incorporated into the algorithm and discussed in detail.
